adHeader: need it picked up or hauled away
adDetails: I'M A HANDYMAN WITH A FEW SKILLS FROM HOUSE CLEANING TO HAULING SO IF THERE'S ANYTHING I CAN GIVE YOU A HAND WITH THEN CALL ME show contact info MACK I'VE BEEN DOING THIS FOR THREE YEARS AND JUST TRYING TO HELP MORE PEOPLE OUT HERE IN THE BAY AREA FOR A SMALLL FEEE, SO NOW ITS UP TO YOU TO CALL MACK I HAVE I PICKUP TRUCK FOR THEM SMALL JOBS YOU NEED DONE,I ALSO FIX AND REPAIR THINGS SO IF THERE ANYWAY I CAN HELP YOU,PLEASE CONTACT ME..I'M A HANDYMAN WITH MANY SKILLS HERE TO SERVE YOU, FROM HOUSE CLEANING TO HAULING OR PICKING THINGS UP THAT YOU HAVE BROUGHT, SO IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS THEN CALL SO I CAN HELP YOU OUT FOR A SMALL FEE show contact info MR URDY I'M HERE TO HELP MY CRAIGSLIST FRIENDS WITH ANYTHING I CAN HELP THEM WITH FOR A SMALL FEE.. I BEEN HELP CRAIGSLIST FOR TWO YRS NOW AND TRYING TO HELP ALL I CAN. NO EMAILS PLEASE NO EMAILS PLEASE
